snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown on Thursday signed a variety of environmental bills, including a measure that requires the public employee pension funds to drop investments in coal.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown signs number of environmental bills, including one that compels state's public employee pension funds to divest from coal; law will make California first state in nation to drop its investments in coal.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown on Thursday signed a variety of environmental bills, including a measure that requires the public employee pension funds to drop investments in coal.

headline.main: California: Pension Funds to Drop Coal Assets
headline.print_headline: California: Pension Funds to Drop Coal Assets
